taskGroup.name: First FeatureIDE Project
taskGroup.intro:
Welcome to the FeatureIDE tutorial.
This tutorial will help you to build your first FeatureIDE project. After you have finished this tutorial, you will have a simple Hello World software product line. If you have problemes at a certain step, you can get the final result using File-> New-> Example in Eclipse's main menu.
The first step for your product line is domain engineering. Here you think about what features to provide for your product.
More Information: For further information about software product line engineering use the help button. This picture will show you the basic idea between domain engineering and application engineering.
Let's start!
taskGroup.onCompletion: Great! You have completed the tutorial!

task.name: Creating a FeatureIDE project
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of FeatureIDE project.
task.onCompletion: You have created your first FeatureIDE project.

task.name: Creating a feature model
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation a feature model.
task.onCompletion: You have created your first feature model.

taskGroup.name: Implementing features
taskGroup.intro: <description> Choose a composer and implement the features. </description>

task.name: AHEAD
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the implementation of features using AHEAD.
task.onCompletion: You have implemented your first FeatureIDE project using AHEAD.

task.name: FeatureC++
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the implementation of features using FeatureC++
task.onCompletion: You have implemented your first FeatureIDE project using FeatureC++.

task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the implementation of features using FeatureHouse
task.onCompletion: You have implemented your first FeatureIDE project using FeatureHouse.

task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the implementation of features using AspectJ
task.onCompletion: You have implemented your first FeatureIDE project using AspectJ

task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the implementation of features using Munge
task.onCompletion: You have implemented your first FeatureIDE project using Munge

task.name: Antenna

task.onCompletion: You have implemented your first FeatureIDE project using Antenna

task.name: Creating a configuration
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a configuration.
task.onCompletion: You have created your first FeatureIDE configuration.

task.name: What next?
task.intro: What can you do to learn more about FeatureIDE?.
